Homework Assignment #2¶

Homework assignment can be downloaed from here

Problem #1¶

A one-sided finite difference expression for \(\left ( \frac{\partial u}{\partial x} \right )_{i}\) can be shown to be

\[\left ( \frac{\partial u}{\partial x} \right )_{i} \approx \frac{3u_{i} - 4u_{i-1} + u_{i-2}}{2 \Delta x}\]
  1. Write the leading term in the truncation error. Assume that the nodes are equally spaced.
  2. What is the order of accuracy of this difference representation?

Problem #2¶
